content: muh-muhs by isabell kraemer a simple yet effective striped shawl to keep you happy do you know those yummy toffees called sahne muh-muhs little cream toffees hand cut and wrapped in yellow-white striped paper while knitting this shawl in these colours i rediscovered my love for these sweet cream candies hmmmmm maybe you d like to try them too muh-muhs © 2013 grasflecken/ isabell kraemer do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact grasfleckenbylilalu@gmail com yarn top merino by lanas stop 125 m 137 yds per skein 2 skeins in main color shown in natural col 700 1 skein in each contrast color shown in honey col 924 and taupe col 720 needle 7 mm circulars or size to get gauge gauge 12 sts x 20 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 in in garter st after blocking gauge isn t crucial but any difference will affect the finished size and yardage 180 cm 72 in 40 cm 16 in instructions co 5 sts with main color set-up row 1 k2 m1 k1 m1 k2 set-up row 2 k2 m1 k1 m1 k1 m1 k1 m1 k2 note try to keep your edge sts loose or do a yo between th e first 2 sts and the last 2 sts on every rs row and drop them on the following row change to contrast color row 1 rs k2 m1 k to 2 sts before end m1 k2 row 2 ws k2 m1 k to 2 sts before end m1 k2 change to main color row 3 rs k2 m1 k to 2 sts before end m1 k2 row 4 ws k2 m1 k1 m1 k to 3 sts before end m1 k1 m1 k2 repeat row 1 to 4 16 more times you will have 181 sts on your needle add multiples of 3 repeats when adding length to the shawl to obtain a number of sts divisible by 6 + 1 page 1 muh-muhs © 2013 grasflecken/ isabell kraemer do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact grasfleckenbylilalu@gmail com change to second contrast color row 1 k2 m1 k to 2 sts before end m1 k2 row 2 k2 m1 p to 2 sts before end m1 k2 you will have 185 sts or a mutliple of 6 +5 sts on your needle work lace panel row 1 k2 *k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo repeat from* to 3 sts before end k3 row 2 and all even numbered row k2 p to 2 sts before end k2 row 3 k4 *yo k3 repeat from* to last st k1 row 5 k2 k2tog *yo ssk k1 k2tog yo sl2 as if to k2tog k1 p2sso repeat from* to 9 sts before end yo ssk k1 k2tog yo ssk k2 row 7 k2 *k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk repeat
